title: Confessions of a Teenager: The Diaries of Three Troubled Teens
description: With Aimee being the smartest and most open girl in the group, what is it that is causing her to be so moody and secretive all of a sudden?Mia, the confident, cheeky and, at times, downright naughty fourteen-year-old, is starting to grow concerned for her best friend, Aims. The trouble is, she has so much more on her mind than her. She has a date with Jay to plan; however, her family and Aimee are just being plain awkward. Why can’t they just be happy for her?Adam, on the other hand, is Aimee’s twin brother. He is completely in love with their best friend, Mia. He is distraught when Jay asks Mia out on a date. Will he ever get the girl of his dreams? Will it last if he does?
author: Katie Taylor
